overview:
Paul Caspers (54) is founder and manager of Coextant Systems International AG.

University degree in economy and computer science (1984) Work as consaltant for information systems in several companies (1984-1994).

Foundation of Coextant Systems (formerly PCS) in 1994. The company specializes in the integration of systems to achieve complete automation of content supply to portals and other mission-critical applications. Its mission is to help customers seamlessly integrate content across groups and boundaries and completely automate its delivery to users on diverse platforms, technologies, applications and devices in multiple formats, structures and languages.

Development of a standard content transformation service - known as Hyper.Net.

Responsible for various content automation project in companies world wide.

Design and development of a Web 2.0 application for free Web publishing - doXtop.
